OrgName: Intelligent Discovery Solutions, Inc. d/b/a iDiscovery Solutions
activities:
Forensic work performed on electronic data from EU countries.
Automated data processing of electronic data for review by attorneys.
eucountries: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Drugs & Pharmaceuticals - (DRG)Telecommunications Services - (TES)Financial Services - (FNS)General Science & Technology - (GST)
recoursemech: Intelligent Discovery Solutions, Inc. (iDS) has agreed to American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program dispute resolution for disputes relating to our compliance with the Safe Harbor Privacy not involving European Union or Switzerland related human resources data. For complaints that cannot be resolved between iDS and the complainant involving European Union or Switzerland related human resources data, iDS has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union data protection authorities (DPAs) and to cooperate with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
